firstquestion.title: Does this product meet the sustainable design objectives you set out at the beginning?

secondquestion.title: What tradeoffs have become apparent to you?

thirdquestion.title: Are there data gaps that must be filled in order for you to make more informed decisions for product design?

fourthquestion.title: What 'hot spots' or areas of high negative impact,  have become apparent to you?

fifthquestion.title: What changes could you make across the life cycle of the product that would improve individual impacts and the overall evaluation of the product?
